MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH38 postcode area of Heriot, affecting properties in Heriot Way and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.38pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.25pm on Tuesday 19th January 2021.
